page.title: 05EVERYDAY LIFE
page.content: A typical day in the life of one of the children within our school and area, would probably run as follows:- After having breakfast, consisting of a cereal and perhaps some toast we would walk to school. Arriving in time for the start at 8.55 am.During the morning there are three lessons of about 1 hour each and a 15 minute break. School stops at 12.15pm for lunch. The afternoon session starting at 1.25 consists of 2 lessons and 5 minute break completing the school day at 3.25pm. During the lunch hour there are normally some activities and clubs for interested parties. The evening would be spent with the home work accumulated during the day and then relaxing with friends or family.
